item.title: Come From Away
item.description: Of all the shows I’ve been lucky enough to see recently, Come From Away is arguably the most important one. Daring to deal with a topic as sensitive as 9⁄11, Come From Away is a surprisingly feel-good show, while being executed absolutely tastefully. Based on a real story, this musical tells a …
